title: Hello IPFS: A Sovereign Archive
content:
Hello IPFS# This is the start of a decentralized archive for my books and articles.
By using IPFS and sjoukje.eth, this content is no longer tied to a single hosting provider. It’s a pragmatic step towards a sovereign digital identity, ensuring my professional archive remains accessible on the decentralized web.
